name: Bing Bing
description: Bing Bing is an innovative fashion e-commerce platform that uses Web3 technology and Internet Computer Protocol (ICP) to enhance the online shopping experience. In Bing Bing, users are able to upload their image to the platform, where our advanced virtual try-on technology overlays the selected fashion items onto the uploaded photos, allowing them to see how the items would look on them before making a purchase.
